meeting_info.location: City Hall, Conference Room 6ES / Video Conference

agenda_items.title: Community Development Division Report
agenda_items.description: This report may include updates to commission members and members of the public, regarding proposed committee meetings, agenda items, presentations, and updates for the Consolidated Plan.

agenda_items.title: Chair’s Report
agenda_items.description: This report includes general greetings and acknowledgements to staff, commission members and other members of the public; introduction of new commission members; additions/changes to committee assignments, scheduling of committee meetings and consideration of future agenda item.

agenda_items.title: Vice Chair’s Report
agenda_items.description: This report may include general acknowledgements to staff, commission members and members of the public.

agenda_items.title: CDC Financial Monitoring/Performance Standards Committee Report(s)
agenda_items.description: CDC Vote on FY 2023-24 CDBG Extensions/Reprogramming Recommendations. CDC Vote on Substantial Amendment No.1 to FY 2023-24 Annual Action Plan (HOME ARPA Grant Reallocation) Recommendations.

agenda_items.title: Announcement
agenda_items.description: Announcements may include: Expressions of thanks, congratulations, or condolence; Information about holiday schedules; honorary or salutary recognition of public officials, employees, or citizens, excluding discussions about changes in their status in public office or employment, reminders about upcoming events organized or sponsored by the governing body; information about social, ceremonial, or community events organized or sponsored by entities other than the governing body, attended or scheduled to be attended by members of the governing body or officials/employees of the political subdivision.

financial_items.description: CDC Vote on FY 2023-24 CDBG Extensions/Reprogramming Recommendations.
CDC Vote on Substantial Amendment No.1 to FY 2023-24 Annual Action Plan (HOME ARPA Grant Reallocation) Recommendations.
